item.title: Last Minute Online Gifts For Good
item.description:
_On Christmas Eve, instead of the typical peaceful house, your home is filled with stress as you realize you forgot a gift. Despite your best efforts, you overlooked someone on your list. The pressure is on to find a solution quickly. Don’t worry, there’s a solution that can save your holiday! Search online and find the K.I.N.D site for the perfect gift. You’ll not only deliver a thoughtful present but also make a difference...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/last-minute-online-gifts-for-good/

item.title: Hainan Airlines is extending its Change for Good program to additional flights
item.description:
Source: Hainan Airlines. Hainan Airlines flight attendants distributing Change for Good donation bags to passengers. Hainan Airlines is significantly expanding its successful in-flight donation program, Change for Good, to include 16 more routes. The program, which supports UNICEF’s initiatives for children, was initially introduced in September 2013 on the Beijing-Haikou route. As the first mainland China-based airline to partner with UNICEF’s Change for Good alliance, Hainan Airlines aims to raise a minimum of RMB 10 million over five years, starting from September 2013...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/hainan-airlines-is-extending-its-change-for-good-program-to-additional-flights/
